George Washington Howe

  1. Foster Name: Unknown
  2. Foster Family: Unknown
  3. Location of Family: Mead, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Fremont, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Date of Death: 1933-06-03
  9. Gender: male
  10. Spouse Name: Julia Howe
  11. Notes: Later reunited with birth mother and step-father Lula J. Howe Galbreth and Robert M. Galbreth.
  12. Source: Colfax County Historical Society; 1920 United States Federal Census; Children's Aid Society Annual Report, n.d., n.p.; Eloise Thomsen Corres. - Howe.
